These Pics Of Tiger Shroff & Disha Patani Prove Their 'Happily Ever After' Is Not Far Away!
Tiger Shroff and Disha Patani are the hottest and fittest couple in tinsel town. The couple leaves their fans in awe whenever they step out together. In fact, their last movie together Baaghi 2 was a massive hit, all thanks to their magical chemistry.
Apart from their onscreen romance, their off-screen romance too has grabbed many eyeballs. The lovely couple often paints the town red with their dinner and movie dates. In fact, the entire industry knows how madly and deeply they are in LOVE with each other.
In the recent episode of Koffee With Karan, Tiger admitted that Disha is his only close friend and he completely trusts her and enjoys being with her, this showed they are inseparable and their relationship is intact. They have always been vocal about their never-dying friendship and long-lasting relationship.
